list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small house at the gates of a park or in the grounds of a large house, occupied by a gatekeeper, gardener, or other employee.
a branch or meeting place of an organization such as the Freemasons.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the foundation of the Grand Lodge of England
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: nền tảng của Grand Lodge of England

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: present (a complaint, appeal, claim, etc.) formally to the proper authorities.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he has 28 days in which to lodge an appeal
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông có 28 ngày để khiếu nại

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make or become firmly fixed or embedded in a particular place.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they had to remove a bullet lodged near his spine
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: họ phải loại bỏ một viên đạn nằm gần cột sống của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: stay or sleep in another person's house, paying money for one's accommodations.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the man who lodged in the room next door
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Người đàn ông lưu trú trong phòng bên cạnh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of wind or rain) flatten (a standing crop).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the variety is high yielding, but it has mostly lodged
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sự đa dạng là năng suất cao, nhưng nó chủ yếu được nộp
